title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.4 - Declaration of overweight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.4 - Declaration of overweight

State Regulations

If a jockey intends to carry overweight, he must declare
the amount thereof at the time of weighing out, or if in doubt as to his proper
weight, he may declare the weight he intends to carry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4225.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
